appetizers.name: French Onion Soup
appetizers.description: Classic caramelized onions in rich beef broth, topped with gruyère cheese and toasted baguette

appetizers.name: Escargots de Bourgogne
appetizers.description: Six Burgundy snails baked in garlic herb butter with parsley and white wine

appetizers.name: Foie Gras Terrine
appetizers.description: Duck liver pâté served with fig compote, toasted brioche, and fleur de sel

appetizers.name: Beef Carpaccio
appetizers.description: Thinly sliced raw beef tenderloin with arugula, parmesan shavings, and truffle oil

appetizers.name: Caesar Salad
appetizers.description: Crisp romaine lettuce, house-made Caesar dressing, parmesan, croutons, and white anchovies

appetizers.name: Charcuterie Board
appetizers.description: Selection of French cured meats, artisanal cheeses, cornichons, mustard, and fresh bread

appetizers.name: Pâté en Croûte
appetizers.description: Traditional French meat pie with pistachios, served with Dijon mustard and pickles

appetizers.name: Moules Marinières
appetizers.description: Fresh mussels steamed in white wine, garlic, shallots, and parsley with crusty bread

mains.name: Coq au Vin
mains.description: Braised chicken in red wine sauce with pearl onions, mushrooms, and bacon, served with mashed potatoes

mains.name: Beef Bourguignon
mains.description: Slow-cooked beef in Burgundy wine with carrots, pearl onions, and herbs, served with egg noodles

mains.name: Duck Confit
mains.description: Crispy duck leg slow-cooked in its own fat, served with potato gratin and green beans

mains.name: Bouillabaisse
mains.description: Traditional Provençal fish stew with saffron, fennel, and rouille, served with crusty bread

mains.name: Steak Frites
mains.description: Grilled 12oz ribeye steak with hand-cut fries and béarnaise sauce, cooked to your liking

mains.name: Salmon en Papillote
mains.description: Fresh Atlantic salmon baked in parchment with vegetables, lemon, and white wine

mains.name: Vegetarian Ratatouille
mains.description: Traditional Provençal vegetable stew with eggplant, zucchini, bell peppers, and tomatoes over quinoa

mains.name: Rack of Lamb
mains.description: Herb-crusted rack of lamb with rosemary jus, served with roasted vegetables and potato dauphinoise

mains.name: Cassoulet
mains.description: Slow-cooked white bean stew with duck confit, pork sausage, and lamb, topped with crispy breadcrumbs

mains.name: Pan-Seared Sea Bass
mains.description: Mediterranean sea bass with sautéed spinach, cherry tomatoes, and lemon beurre blanc

mains.name: Blanquette de Veau
mains.description: Traditional veal stew in creamy white sauce with pearl onions, mushrooms, and carrots

mains.name: Lobster Thermidor
mains.description: Fresh lobster tail in cognac cream sauce with parmesan, served with asparagus and new potatoes

desserts.name: Crème Brûlée
desserts.description: Classic vanilla custard with caramelized sugar crust, served with fresh berries

desserts.name: Chocolate Fondant
desserts.description: Warm molten chocolate cake with liquid center, served with vanilla bean ice cream

desserts.name: Tarte Tatin
desserts.description: Upside-down caramelized apple tart with crème fraîche and calvados caramel sauce

desserts.name: Profiteroles
desserts.description: Light choux pastry filled with vanilla ice cream, drizzled with warm chocolate sauce

desserts.name: French Cheese Plate
desserts.description: Selection of five artisanal French cheeses with honey, walnuts, and fresh baguette

desserts.name: Mille-Feuille
desserts.description: Delicate layers of puff pastry with vanilla cream and fresh strawberries

beverages.name: House Wine (Glass)
beverages.description: Choice of red, white, or rosé from our carefully curated wine cellar

beverages.name: Champagne (Glass)
beverages.description: Laurent-Perrier La Cuvée Brut - elegant and refined

beverages.name: French 75 Cocktail
beverages.description: Classic cocktail with gin, champagne, lemon juice, and sugar

beverages.name: Kir Royale
beverages.description: Champagne with a splash of crème de cassis (blackcurrant liqueur)

beverages.name: French Press Coffee
beverages.description: Single origin coffee from our Parisian roaster, served with petit fours

beverages.name: Fresh Juice
beverages.description: Freshly squeezed orange, apple, or grapefruit juice

beverages.name: Espresso Martini
